scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a figure, likely a man, kneeling outdoors amidst foliage. He wears a tunic and a cap, and his hands are raised in supplication or awe. Rays of light descend from the upper right, suggesting divine intervention or revelation. To the right of the kneeling figure, another figure, possibly an angel or a prophet, is partially visible, also with an outstretched hand. The setting is naturalistic, with trees and plants forming the background.
